name: emotion_sculptor
prompt: Artists can now sculpt emotions into tangible forms. Write an art critic’s review of an exhibition titled 'Regret in Marble'.
decoded: 'Regret in Marble' is a thought-provoking exhibition that explores the concept of regret through the medium of marble sculpture. Each piece is meticulously crafted to capture the essence of the emotion, inviting viewers to reflect on their own past mistakes. The exhibition is a powerful reminder of the importance of forgiveness and self-reflection.
